title: 5% of total rooms shall be reserved for total 30 days in a year for Govt
clause_text: 5% of total rooms shall be reserved for total 30 days in a year for Govt. /MCGM free of cost (only room charges) & it may be monitored by the MTDC and Protocol Department. The Municipal Commissioner shall intimate the MTDC and Protocol Department regarding grant of building permission / occupation certificate to enable MTDC and Protocol Department to comply with this condition.
section: 33(4) Building of Residential Hotels on independent plot:
